column5: NDRA got 112 adds chillin with the CTO ride or die my dudes stop under 1
NDRA I added and the fact that the CTO bought 30k shares in open market gave me all the confidence I need with my position
NDRA Keeps breaking my heart daily
NDRA stop loss hit for 15 profit will buy below 1 dollar
Short sale volume not short interest for NDRA at 20190520 is 40 shortvolumescomtNDRA via shortvolumes

NDRA Of course Im sure shorts already know Michael Thornton Chief Technology Officer who added shares yesterday was a founder and president of Enhanced Vision Systems Corp or EVS which was acquired by General Electric Company Doubt hed be adding if they needed to raise cash right now Nice resume and history with GE
NDRA cheapies here filling all I can these levels

NDRA Took a position Insider just added Dont see cash raise before data considering it should be available before Q3 And even if there is so what If you look at past raises there has been small pullbacks followed by considerable upsides prior to the recent fallout Also could do financing without dilution Theyre almost at the finish line after all these years and shorts or nervous longs have convinced many to dump their shares at 52 week lows Ive placed my bet Downside 1 Upside unlimited
NDRA I have a small order of 230 in at 113 to average down a little Its being filled in bits and pieces Someone just sold me 2 shares Hopefully the whole order will fill
NDRA Added the ndraw today GE grabs this company in 12 months imo
NDRA Its also possible considering the fact that the previous dump did not carry it all the way to the bottom that the red line here is the new lower baseline
NDRA well that didnt work lol what else they got up their sleeve to dilute
